title: 'Seamless Installation and Convenient Voice Commands!'
body: I recently purchased the Wipro Smart Node device, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for my home automation setup! The installation process was an absolute breeze. With clear instructions and a user-friendly interface, I had the device up and running in no time.  One of the standout features of the Wipro Smart Node is its voice command integration. Being able to control my lights, appliances, and more using simple voice commands has added a new level of convenience to my daily routine. Whether it's adjusting the lighting for different moods or turning off devices without getting up, the voice commands have truly made life easier.  The device's compatibility with various smart home platforms has also impressed me. It seamlessly integrates with my existing smart home ecosystem, allowing me to manage all my devices from a single interface.  The build quality of the Smart Node is top-notch, and it's evident that Wipro has paid attention to both functionality and aesthetics. The sleek design blends well with my home decor.  In conclusion, the Wipro Smart Node device has exceeded my expectations in terms of ease of installation and the efficiency of voice commands. If you're looking to elevate your smart home experience, I highly recommend giving this device a try!

title: 'Effortless control at your fingertips'
body: The Wipro Smart Switch Module has made managing my home lighting an absolute breeze. Installation was a snap, and in no time, I had complete control over my lights using my voice and smart assistants. The convenience of controlling the lights from my smartphone, even when I'm not home, has been a game-changer. It's reassuring to know that I can always check if I left any lights on and turn them off remotely. The fact that it works with my existing wiring was a major selling point for me, and it's been working flawlessly since day one. Highly recommended for anyone looking to make their home smarter and life easier!

title: 'I converted my old home to smart home.'
body: I recently got my hands on the Wipro Smart Switch Module, and I can't stop raving about it! This little device has truly transformed the way I control the lighting in my home. Installing it was a breeze, and within minutes, I had my existing switches converted into smart switches. Now, I can effortlessly control the lights with just my voice, thanks to its compatibility with Alexa and Google Home. What's more, I can manage the lights from anywhere using the smartphone app, which is incredibly convenient. The best part is that it still allows me to use the manual switches whenever I prefer the old-school way. It's like having the best of both worlds! If you're looking to make your home smarter, I highly recommend the Wipro Smart Switch Module - it's a real game-changer!

title: 'Nice product'
body: 'I really like th eproduct
column5: easy to install and use. Unlike lot of other reviews there is no disconnect state if power/router goes off. Once router is back online
column6: it cautomatically connects. I am just doubful of quality - for e.g. typicall we use 1mm core wires in our home
column7: this one uses vry thin wire so worried if load increases or lights run for long time will cause any issues.'

title: 'Good for the price.'
body: 'It does what is claimed on the box. The soldering on the board is good and the component seems to be of decent quality. But
column5: the wires coming from the box are very thin
column6: I guess they are using this to sense the state of the original switch. Also
column7: I would have preferred if they had used solid-state relays as the mechanical ones might wear out in a few years.'

title: 'Stopped working after 3 months'
body: Was easy to install and operate. But now after 3 months it is no longer working. Tried all options but the light on the unit just blinks when powered on. Of course appliances connected to it can be operated manually. But can't be operated thru Alexa or the app. Can't be detected over wifi nor can be reset. Can't even find the manual online. Disappointing especially since it's from a reputed firm like Wipro. Not even sure how to complain since Amazon does not provide for the same except this product review option.
